#cloud-config

apt_update: true
packages:
 - python-minimal
 - python-pip
byobu_default: system 

ssh_authorized_keys:
  - ssh-rsa  hungphan@hungphan
  - ssh-rsa  Generated-by-Nova

runcmd:
 - sudo bash
 - export LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"
 - export FLASK_CONFIG=production
 - git clone https://gitlab.com/HungPhann/acc17-sparkmaster.git /home/ubuntu/SparkMaster
 - pip install -r /home/ubuntu/SparkMaster/requirements.txt
 - python /home/ubuntu/SparkMaster/run.py
